name: Discovering the Unkown
description:
Discovering the Unknown is a game set to take place inside Monterey Canyon, covering the theme of "Bottom of the Trench." You are a diver sent out to explore an underwater cave system with limited breath. While you are exploring the cave, keep your eyes peeled for air pockets, as well as some underwater friends who are hiding inside. See if you can try to find them all! Good luck diving!

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Left Shift to Sprint

Game Development:

  • Started: April 16, 2022 at 2:00am CST
  • Finished: April 17, 2022 at 11:00pm CST

Created By: 

  • Spooky (Connor Pargman)
  • cfn (Jakson Coffin)

Assets Used:

  • Font: Pixeled by OmegaPC777
  • Song: 8 Bit Presentation by David Fesliyan
